name: The Mystery of Stalore-9
description:
As rumors spread about the planet Stalore-9, "The planet where ships go missing". One crew of scavengers heads to the planet to investigate the source, hoping to score some of this lost loot along the way.

Suddenly your ship is in danger, you start to plummet from the sky. regaining consciousness, your ships AI tries to guide you through your journey of trying to dive deep enough to solve the issue of this planet.

CONTROLS:

Keyboard -

WASD to move - Left click to shoot - E to Use doors and collect data pads

Controller - Left stick to move - right trigger to shoot - A to Use doors and collect data pads.

BUGFIXED VERSION: Prompt to enter ships now displays properly - Reduced mouse sensitivity - Final door disappears correctly - Lights on consoles now update.
